org.erlide.wrangler.refactoring.codeinspection.view
Class GraphImageView

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.core.commands.common.EventManager
      org.eclipse.ui.part.WorkbenchPart
          org.eclipse.ui.part.ViewPart
              org.erlide.wrangler.refactoring.codeinspection.view.GraphImageView
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExecutableExtension, org.eclipse.ui.IPersistable, org.eclipse.ui.IViewPart, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart2, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart3, org.eclipse.ui.part.IWorkbenchPartOrientation
public class GraphImageView
extends org.eclipse.ui.part.ViewPart

This ImageView class shows how to use SWTImageCanvas to manipulate images.

To facilitate the usage, you should setFocus to the canvas at the beginning, and call the dispose at the end.

Author:
Chengdong Li: cli4@uky.edu, Gy√∂rgy Orosz
See Also:
uky.article.imageviewer.SWTImageCanvas
